issue.subject: Proxy cannot send HTTP body if code <> 200, fix for #1325
issue.description:
Defect #1325 fix introduce an error in HTTP, no body is send but content length is set. Result in a timeout on some client.

OgcProxyServlet.sendException seems to be unable to send a HTTP body to client if the HTTP status code is not 200.

For the #1325 "no public policy is found, the proxy should send an HTTP 401 to ask for authentication" we'll use the Java Servlet API default error (servletResponse.sendError).
